mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.* FROM( SELECT TT1.rnum AS num, TT1.u_id AS "uId", TT1.name, TT1.passwd, TT1.u_level AS intLevel, TT1.recommend, TT1.email, --reg_dt가 당일이면 HH24:MI DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt,'YYYYMMDD') ,TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ,TO_CHAR(TT1.reg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) regDt FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T1.* FROM( SELECT * FROM hr_member --검색조건 ORDER BY reg_dt DESC )T1 WHERE ROWNUM < = 10 )TT1 WHERE rnum >= 1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM hr_member --검색조건 )B
mapper.update: UPDATE hr_member SET name = ${name}, passwd = ${passwd}, u_level = ${level}, login = ${login}, recommend = ${recommend}, email = ${email}, reg_dt = SYSDATE WHERE u_id = ${uId}
mapper.select: SELECT u_id as "uId", name, passwd, u_level as intLevel, login, recommend, email, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDt FROM hr_member WHERE u_id LIKE #{uId}||'%' ORDER BY u_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM hr_member WHERE u_id LIKE #{uId} ||'%'
SELECT u_id, name, passwd, u_level, login, recommend, email, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt FROM hr_member WHERE u_id = #{uId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hr_member ( u_id, name, passwd, u_level, login, recommend, email, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{uId}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{intLevel}, #{login}, #{recommend}, #{email}, SYSDATE )
